column4: Anyone know how to install the nonfree flash plugin in Firefox 3?
what version of ubuntu?
It's Hardy (yes, I'm asking in #ubuntu+1 but no one knows)
people are answering your question there
http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/releases/8.04/release/
You know, I JUST found that page too :)  But thank you.
more available (all of the main repository)
So installing from the DVD will still give me the identical system as from CD?
it should
use find (or use the zsh shell's extra globbing abilities)
Can I pipe the rm command into find?
search for "-not" on the page.  /-not<enter>
thank you
However, that wasn't found :)
hit 'g' and try again...
Ah... learning new stuff all the time.  THanks.
When the man page says "expr" is that saying I use a regex for that?
no I don't think so.  I think you can do -not -name foo.  I'm not sure on this.  Play with it
Alright.... thanks again :)
pastebin why you think they are broken
actually, just see the /topic
They don't download or are very slow.  Yeah, I know the topic says there are issues, but it doesn't say when they'll be resolved or how to work around them.
yes it does, use a local mirror
Oh, I didn't see that yesterday.  Thanks.
